name: Afrika
name_long: The African continent including Madagascar & other islands
description: The entire African continent, Madagascar and some islands make up roughly a quarter of the world's total land surface.

name: Europa
description: West & East Europe including all of Russia and the Central Asian countries. The group is defined by Gapmidner, to make up roughly a quarter of the world's total land surface.
North, South & central America make up roughly a quarter of the world's total land surface.

name: Azië
name_long: Australia, Pacific Islands, South & South East Asia
description: Asia as defined by Gapmidner, to make up roughly a quarter of the world's total land surface.
